name: Undead Shinanigans
description:
CAGD 470 - Fall 2019

Digital Penguins - Renzo Romero, Warren Rose II, Wesley Morrison

Undead Shinanigans is a hybrid between platforming and puzzle-solving revolving around a necromancer who utilizes shambling minions to help deal with threats and solve puzzles. Your summons can activate and block different traps and puzzles, are useful for navigating through the levels. With access with two minions to summons,create your own path as you find wacky and strange ways to make it to the end.

The game takes place in a strange lair where, due to a series of accidents, something is loose in your lair. It’s up to you and your minions to make it past your own meticulous traps and puzzles to get out of the lair alive and find what caused the accident. With 5 levels to play and endless possibilities on how to utilize your minions to solve puzzles, Undead Shinanigans will test how well you utilize your resources.

System Requirements: 

Windows 10

Processor - i5-6600

Graphics - integrated

Memory - 512 MB

DirectX - Version 11

Storage - 100 MB

Sound Card - DirectX compatible
